programme.desc: Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Begonia that he is nice in 'Crashing Gargamel's Party', then in 'The Curse of the Smurfs' Treasure', Farmer and Vanity unearth an unlucky magical chest! (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Plankton must work together to survive in 'Delivery to Monster Island', then in 'Ride Patrick Ride', SpongeBob teaches Patrick how to ride a bike.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Pearl stars in a guest appearance in 'Pearl Wants to Be a Star', then in 'Super Sitters', Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Second Wind: Knuckles the Dread's pirate crew rages against Dr. Deep and Dr. Done It. The Eggforcers triumph and take Dredd's shard, abandoning the captive Rusty Rose behind. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thundermans Banished! - Part 2: After their superhero secret is exposed, the family is relocated to a new city. But Phoebe & Max must risk everything to save Hiddenville. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Space Invaders, Part 2: Captain Man & Kid Danger discover who has taken the astronauts hostage. After realizing the astronauts are not so innocent, their alleigances change. (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Timid is too shy, Papa Smurf helps boost his confidence in 'Relaxosmurf', then in 'The Cuddly Toy', only Baby's cuddly toy will let him get back to sleep when Lazy loses his pillow. (S2, ep 20)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Begonia, Lily, and Blossom teach Wild a lesson in 'Wild Gets Tamed', then in 'The Yummyus Pie', Chef is worried when the main ingredient for his famous Equinox pie is late blooming. (S2, ep 21)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie for his latest scheme in 'Spin the Bottle', then in 'There's a Sponge in My Soup', Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move in.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Man Ray rents Squidward's house, so SpongeBob and Patrick must stop his vacation in 'Man Ray Returns', then in 'Larry the Floor Manager', Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and hires a temporary manager.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Clyde discovers he didn't earn the junior administrator job in 'Absent Minded', then in 'Be Stella My Heart', Lincoln and his friends begin to suspect that the new girl likes one of them. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club in 'Sitting Bull', then in 'The Spies Who Love Me', Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown but her grandparents spy on her. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The enemies of the Star family team up to exact their revenge in 'Best Served Cold', then in 'Tattoo Hullabaloo', Bunny's sailor tattoo finds himself in trouble. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hires other Patricks to entertain at parties in 'Too Many Patricks', then in 'Much Tofu About Nothing', Pat-Thos shares a Hamdonian tale of love and pork products. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: It's Smurfies versus Gargamel in 'See Gargamel Run', then in 'Hefty Baby', Baby Smurf gets stronger. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast in 'Late for Breakfast', then in 'Bummer Jobs', Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: Sonic Prime

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: Victorious

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Cherry Bad Things: Cherry visits, and the Thundermans discover she still has her superpowers. Cherry promises to remove them after her day with Phoebe and Chloe, but there's a problem. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Day of the Octopus: It's Rock Island's Octopus Festival, but there's not an octopus in sight...In an effort to save the festival, Taylor and Nori set off to solve the mystery. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Monsty: When Mika tries too hard to win Man's Nest Employee of The Month, she creates a monster that could ruin the telethon Danger Force is hosting. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Mara, the Hippo: A wooden crate falls from a running truck, and inside it is Mara, a small female hippo who was returning to Africa. The Buffycats help Mara get on the plane home. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: 44 Cats

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must turn detective to track it down in 'Squid Noir', then in 'Scavenger Pants', Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on a scavenger hunt.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lisa invents a way to curb the family's fibs in 'House of Lies', and in 'Game Boys', Lincoln asks to borrow Clyde's new gaming system, but Clyde struggles to trust that it's safe with him. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf would like a dragon in 'I Want a Dragon', then in 'Magic Meltdown', an abandoned cauldron takes revenge. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so journeys into the couch to find it in 'Lost in Couch', then in 'Pat-a-thon', Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lori and Bobby find a kitten in 'Meet the Purrents', then in 'Apartment Complex', after telling her family how great her apartment is, Lori's sisters secretly take over her space. (S9, ep 3)

programme.desc: The Case of the Disoriented Drone / The Case of the Baffling Birthday: Then Ava wants to give Maudie her first proper birthday party but Maudie gets sidetracked by a mystery. (S1 Ep10)

programme.desc: New Classmate: At school, Tee Zeng is surprised to see that Hiro Hao has transferred to her class! Tee Zeng is appointed to be Hiro Hao's buddy to help him adapt to the new environment. (S1 Ep16)

programme.desc: Epic Fail: Astra crafts a faulty talisman, putting Squishella and Gwen in a situation that's too close for comfort. (S1 Ep108)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Earworm: Frustrated at her classmates, Toralei and her band release earworms that control everyone's thoughts. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Growing Ghoulia: Ghoulia tries to get the top spot on Monster High's Horror Roll but unleashes a zombie invasion. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Cleo in the Kitchen: Cleo tries to make a home-cooked meal to raise Clawdeen's spirits and cure her homesickness. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Case of the Missing Squeak: Ghoulia helps Lagoona find her precious, secret toy, inspecting all of their classmates for the culprit. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Thirst Quencher: It's another heatwave and even the riverbed has dried up. A very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the lemmings have used the last of the water to fill their inflatable pool. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Spider Lemmings: The lemmings have caught a spider and her sticky, elastic threads are perfect for bungee jumping, but Grizzy discovers that he has arachnophobia. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Random Bear: Grizzy and the lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Interference: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner, but his meal is interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy finds that the true 'interference' is down to the lemmings. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Construction Bear: Grizzy decides to build a building to impress she-bear. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Kung Fu Lemmings: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Midsummer Bear's Dream: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight but is woken up by the Lemmings blasting music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intellectual Bear: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his head, Grizzy is transformed into a being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Tomos a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in Tomos and friends' world today?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae HP a Twt yn cystadlu yn erbyn ei gilydd i weld pwy yw cwch cyflyma'r harbwr. HP and Twt compete to see who the fastest boat in the harbour is, but HP goes a bit too fast. Oh dear!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Ar l i gawod drom ddinistrio ei gastell tywod, mae Blero'n ystyried pam bod rhaid iddi fwrw glaw o gwbl. Blero wonders why it has to rain after a downpour washes away his sandcastle.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth newydd gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. The theme of this programme is the sense of sight.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae edrych ar ol wy yn un o'r petha mwya pwysig all ddewryn bach ddysgu, ond mae'n well gan Odo chwara pel-droed! Caring for an egg is so important to birds but Odo would rather play footie!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn mynd a'i ffrindiau i weld hen balas coll! On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn is taking the friends to see a long-lost palace!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd yr antur yn mynd ni i gyfandir Ewrop ac i Wlad Belg. Yma, byddwn ni'n dysgu am brifddinas Brwsel a'i phwysigrwydd i wleidyddiaeth Ewrop, We are in Belgium eating chocolate!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Er nad ydynt yn siarad 'run iaith, mae'r Jetlu a Crwbi'n deall ei gilydd ddigon da i drechu Beti Bowen a'r Cnafon Creulon. The Jetlu and Crubbi unite to defeat Beti Bowen and Cruel Cnafon.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen heddiw, mae Gweni'n gofyn 'Pam bod parotiaid mor lliwgar?', ac mae gan Tad-cu ateb dwl a doniol am wneuthurwr teganau. Today, Gweni asks 'Why are parrots so colourful?'.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Mae Nana Po yn caru ei chi bach, ond tydy hi ddim yn caru'r ffaith ei fod o'n cario mwd i'r ty drwy'r amser. Po loves her puppy, but her puppy loves lying in a muddy flowerbed!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Cyfres am anifeiliaid y byd - y tro hwn: y rhai talaf ac un o'r byraf! Series about animals around the world - this time, some of the tallest and one of the shortest!

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae Hari Hipo wrth ei fodd yn chwarae yn y mwd - ond ddim heddiw. Tybed pam a thybed a all gair newydd heddiw, 'pont' ei helpu? Wil today's word, 'bridge', help Hari Hippos?

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo'n hoff iawn o ganeuon, ac un cn yn arbennig. Ond yw gwrando ar yr un gn drosodd a throsodd am bylu yn y diwedd? Pablo loves music and one song in particular!

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad i ddweud fod cwch Capten Jac wedi torri. Rhaid mynd i helpu Jac a Gruff i'w thrwsio! Harri gets a call to say that Captain Jack's boat has broken down.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod dryslyd iawn i'r Cymylaubychain heddiw a Ffwffa Cwmwl sy'n gyfrifol. Everyone is confused today and it's all Ffwffa Cwmwl's fault.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Dydi Twm Twrch erioed wedi bod yn gwersylla a felly mae Dorti, yn gyffrous iawn, yn ei wahodd i fynd gyda hi. Twm Twrch has never been camping and so Dorti invites him to go with her.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gwyneth Gwrtaith yn cynnal te prynhawn. Ond mae pethau'n mynd yn anniben iawn pan bod gyrr o wartheg yn ymyrryd. An afternoon tea turns into chaos when a herd of cows turn up.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae diwrnod y ras gychod wedi cyrraedd, ac mae pawb yn benderfynol o ennill - yn enwedig Gwich. It's the annual Regatta race and everyone is determined to win, especially Ratty.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn dysgu am saith rhyfeddod Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are learning about the seven wonders of Pop Paper City!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Tro ma: Cymru! Dyma wlad gyda heniaith, sef y Gymraeg, cestyll, bwyd enwog fel bara lawr a phrifddinas o'r enw Caerdydd. This time we visit Wales to learn about the language, castles & more.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Moc Samson yn gwneud rhaglen ddogfen ar y Jet-lu. Ai bod yn arwr sy'n bwysig, neu'r gydnabyddiaeth? Moc Samson is making a documentary on the Jet-lu.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Ceris yn gofyn 'Pam bod y byd yn grwn?' ac mae Tad-cu'n ateb gyda stori dwl a doniol am ddau frawd. This time Ceris asks 'Why is the world round?' and Tad-cu spins one of his tall tales.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cymeriadau newydd sbon fel Clem Clocsio, Myrddin y Dewin a Vanessa drws nesa, a rhai o'n hen ffefrynnau. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.desc: Mae plant bach wrth eu bodd yn creu ystumiau gyda'u cyrff. Dyma gn am fwrw glaw! Children love to create different shapes with their bodies, and this is a song about rain, with movement!

programme.desc: Mae symud cnau mewn casgen i dy-coeden Cochyn yn profi'n waith anodd! Taking some nuts in a barrel up to Cochyn's treehouse turns into a difficult task!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae'r Dreigiau mewn picl pan fydd angen iddynt newid amserlen y rheilffordd. The Dragons get in a pickle when they need to change the railway's timetable.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Watcyn yn gwylltio Hen Ben trwy ddwyn ei sbectol ac mae'n rhaid iddo ddibynnu ar Guto a'i ffrindiau i'w achub rhag llid y dylluan. Watcyn Wiwer angers Hen Ben Owl by taking his glasses.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Cynwyd Sant sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chware llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Cynwyd Sant join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Gair heddiw yw 'ci' ac mae rhaglen heddiw'n llawn cwn - ci gwlyb, ci smotiog, ci wedi ei baentio. Today's word is 'ci' and the programme is full of wet dogs, spotty dogs and a painted dog.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Tydi Deian methu'n ln dod o hyd i Nedw Napan, a does dim ffiars i fod o am fynd i aros i dy Nain a Taid heb ei ffrind cwtchlyd. Nedw Napan is missing and he's needed for bedtime!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Rhaid i'r Octonots rwystro dau ferdysyn mantis rhag ymladd cyn i'w crafangau cryfion chwalu'r Octofad. The Octonauts must stop two mantis shrimps fighting before they destroy the Octopad.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Cai yn mynd ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld madarch o bob lliw a llun yn cael eu tyfu. Cai goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to see all sorts of wonderful mushrooms being grown.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn teithio i Baris i ddysgu am Pierre Lallement, y dyn wnaeth greu'r beic gyda phedalau nol yn 1863. We learn how bikes work and about the different types, such as motorbikes.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Sali Mali mewn penbleth wrth weld olion traed dieithr ar garreg y drws ac mae'n canfod mai rhai broga ydyn nhw. Sali Mali is puzzled by mysterious footprints on her door step.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Jen a'r llong danfor yn ei chael hi'n anodd dilyn cyfarwyddiadau. Jen and the Submarine are having difficulty understanding directions. Can Jim & Capten Carys help them learn the basics?

programme.title: Patrl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'r Pawenlu yn mynd i'r jyngl i helpu eu ffrind Teifi i ddod o hyd i'w barot. The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Teifi find his lost parrot!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd criw o forladron bach Ysgol Pen-y-Garth yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys yn l? Ben Dant and Cadi need help from Ysgol Pen-y-Garth's pirates.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Yng nghanol y goedwig, allwch chi glywed yr holl synau gwahanol? Ma Harmoni, Melodi a Bop eisiau gwybod pwy sy'n swnio fel ffliwt. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop wonder who makes a hooting sound.

programme.title: Sam Tn
programme.desc: Mae'n ben-blwydd Sam ac mae pawb wedi trefnu anrheg arbennig iddo, Jiwpityr bach trydanol. It's Sam's birthday and the crew arrange a present for him, a small electronic version of Jupiter.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sam a Sin yn byrddio'r Macrell Frithog i chwilio am gorgimychiaid ond mae'r pysgota'n mynd ar chwl gyda'r tywydd! Sam Spratt takes Sin out on the Merry Mackerel to catch prawns!

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Morfa Rhiannedd, Llandudno yn ymweld ag ASRA yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol Morfa Rhiannedd, Llandudno visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol i suo plant bach i gysgu. A traditional lullaby to lull little children to sleep.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn yn chwarae gm newydd mae wedi ei chreu ac mae Digbi'n awyddus iawn i greu gm newydd hefyd. Cochyn is playing a new game he's invented. Digbi wishes he could invent a game too.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan mae problem gyda rheiliau poeth, a all y Dreigiau eu hoeri mewn pryd? When there's a problem with hot rails, can the Dragons cool them down in time?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wrth i Benja arwain yr ymgyrch i ddwyn mefus o ardd Mr Puw mae'n dod i ddeall yn fuan nad ydy'n hawdd bod yn arweinydd da! Benja learns it's harder than he thinks to be a good leader.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ln Las sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ln Las join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes dwr ar gyfer injans, a all y dreigiau drwsio pethau heb gael eu stemio! When there's no water for engines, can the dragons fix things without getting steamed up!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae cystadleuaeth rhwng Deian a Loli mewn gm o golff gwyllt, ac mae chwarae'n troi'n chwerw wrth i'r ddau daro'r bl run pryd i'r felin wynt a'i thorri. A game of crazy golf turns bad!

programme.title: Li Ban

programme.title: Academi Gomedi
programme.desc: Mewn cyfres newydd sbon, mae saith comediwr ifanc brwdfrydig yn cyrraedd yr Academi Gomedi. In a brand new series, seven young enthusiastic budding comedians arrive at Academi Gomedi.

programme.title: New: 24 Awr Newidiodd Gymru
programme.desc: Mae Pennod 11 yn adrodd stori 'Gm y Ganrif' rhwng Cymru a'r Crysau Duon. Episode 11 tells the story of the 'Match of the Century' between Wales and the All Blacks.

programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau gm yr ACT Brumbies v Y Llewod Prydeinig a Gwyddelig, a chwaraewyd yn gynharac. Highlights of the ACT Brumbies v The British & Irish Lions match, played earlier in Canberra.

programme.title: Cellar Dweller
programme.desc: 1988. Horror. Director: John Carl Buechler. Stars Yvonne De Carlo, Debrah Farentino & Brian Robbins. A comic book artist is doomed to repeat history when her imagination awakens deadly creatures. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro ends an excellent yet horrifying night with a look at the films for next week, where we expect to continue the horror but with a peculiar twist. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: The Late Nancy Irving. 1984. Stars Cristina Raines & Marius Goring. A victim of a car accident finds herself in hospital and discovers that she is not a patient but a prisoner... [S]

programme.title: The Seventh Commandment
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Director: Irvin Berwick. Stars Jonathan Kidd, Lyn Statten & Frank Arvidson. A car crash victim turns to religion after losing his memory but his girlfriend reappears to cause trouble. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Castles in the Air. 1966. A beautifully shot film which looks at the magnificent castles of the Dordogne province of France and the fairytale countryside surrounding them.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Family Tree. 1963. Stars Irene Ryan, Rosemary DeCamp & Harriet E. MacGibbon. The head of a 'first family' historical society becomes enchanted by the Clampetts antiques and their way of life. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: By the Deep Six. Western with Wayne Rogers & Robert Bray, who run a stagecoach line in the Old West where they come across a wide variety of killers, robbers and ladies in distress. [S]

programme.title: The Great Van Robbery
programme.desc: 1959. Crime Drama. Director: Max Varnel. Stars Denis Shaw, Kay Callard & Tony Quinn. An Interpol detective pursues a dangerous thief who has placed his loot into a bank account in Rio de Janeiro. [S]

programme.title: Noose
programme.desc: 1948. Crime drama starring Derek Farr, Carole Landis & Stanley Holloway. Sugiani, a black-market racketeer (Joseph Calleia), is amassing a fortune until reporter Linda Medbury is on to him. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Keeping Fit
programme.desc: 1962. A light-hearted look at the different ways people kept themselves fit in the 1960s.

programme.title: Beach Red
programme.desc: 1967. Action. Directed by and stars Cornel Wilde. Features Rip Torn and Burr DeBenning. The hard-edged and thoughtful story of the men involved in a battle for control of an island during WWII. [S]

programme.title: The Runaway Bus
programme.desc: 1954. Comedy. Director: Val Guest. Stars Frankie Howerd, Margaret Rutherford & Petula Clark. An inept bus driver gets lost in fog with a group of passengers, on a coach laden with stolen gold. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout July. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Breakdown. 1975. Stars Jean Anderson, Richard Easton & Larry Noble. Edward and Jennifer combine business and pleasure during a skiing holiday in Switzerland. Merroney plans for Brian to resign. [S]

programme.title: Bandido
programme.desc: 1956. Western. Directed by Richard Fleisher. Stars Robert Mitchum, Ursula Thiess & Gilbert Roland. An adventurer teams up with a rebel leader to steal an arms shipment due for government troops. [S]

programme.title: Man on the Run (1949)
programme.desc: 1949. Crime Drama. Directed by Lawrence Huntington. Stars Valentine Dyall, Derek Farr & Leslie Perrins. Having deserted the army, Peter Burdon is continually on the run. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Time Slip/Haunted Trawler. 1995. Michael Aspel looks at the unexplained stories of a man who had been called out to exorcise a fishing trawler, and three families who had travelled back in time. [S]

programme.title: Danger UXB
programme.desc: Just Like a Woman. 1979. Stars Anthony Andrews, Steven Grives & Alfie Bass. Ash and Machin are brought to London from a bomb disposal course and attend to a dangerous bomb.

programme.title: Van der Valk
programme.desc: One Herring's Not Enough. 1972. Stars Barry Foster, Michael Latimer & Susan Travers. Van der Valk's day gets worse when someone contacts the station to say that he has just killed his wife. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret and the Princess. 2003. Stars Bruno Cremer, Colette Renard & Guillaume Gallienne. Count de Saint-Hilaire is found dead in his study in his town house. Maigret discreetly takes on the case. [S]

programme.title: Sex (Re) Education
programme.desc: Stars: Feodor Atkine, Sylwvie Granotier & Irene Jacob. Isabelle is traumatised when she catches her father and Rose in the act... [S]

programme.title: Mon Oncle

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: 1945. Famous northern comedian Frank Randle stars in this comedy where his sweetheart's parents disapprove of him. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Reluctant Carpenter. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Sherlock is against the clock to locate a bomb hidden in London by an extortionist. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Where No Tide Flows
programme.desc: 1963. A fascinating look at canals and how they have been rediscovered by holidaymakers.

programme.title: The Chase (1946)

programme.title: The Lady Craved Excitement
programme.desc: 1950. Comedy. Directed by Francis Searle. Stars Hy Hazell, Michael Medwin & Sidney James. A cabaret artist seeking adventure gets herself and her partner caught up with shady characters. [S]

programme.title: Sea Devils
programme.desc: 1953. Adventure. Director: Raoul Walsh. Stars Rock Hudson, Yvonne De Carlo, Maxwell Reed. Based on Victor Hugo's 'Toilers of the Sea', the threat of Napoleonic invasion hangs heavy over Britain. [S]

programme.title: The Court Martial of Major Keller
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Director: Ernest Morris. Stars Laurence Payne, Ralph Michael, Basil Dignam. Decorated British army officer, Major Keller, is court-martialled for the murder of his commanding officer. [S]

programme.title: Piccadilly Incident
programme.desc: 1946. War. Director: Herbert Wilcox. Stars Anna Neagle, Michael Wilding, Coral Browne & Edward Rigby. A missing Wren returns from a desert isle and finds her husband has a new wife and son. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Who Was Kate Greer? - Part 1. 1973. Stars Ruth Trouncer & Bernard Brown. Winifred is on trial for perjury and perverting the course of justice after giving false evidence in a previous trial. [S]

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Bewitched Lamp: In the desert, Molang and Piu Piu find a magic lamp. It may grant wishes, but it also causes some damage... (S5 Ep38)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Perfect Robot: Molang and Piu Piu order a robot that does everything, but don't realise it's doing too much... (S5 Ep39)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Little Yellow Riding Hood: Petula hasn't written her story for school, and it's due tomorrow. Ollie draws an old storybook and out pops Little Yellow Riding Hood, also known as Micheline. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Generous Genie: Mustard's skateboard was confiscated after he crossed the street without looking. Cars are so lame... If only one could fly over them! Ollie draws a magic lamp. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Mysterious Egyptian Pyramid: Mixo has decided to learn hieroglyphics, but if he really wants to do that, he needs to see the real thing, in Egypt. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Mustard's Messed-up Birthday: Today is Mustard's birthday, and the MiniWhats are trying to figure out what to get him. Ollie draws him a gigantic skateboard ramp. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Sad Announcer: The MiniWhats are bored because they're not allowed to spend as much time on their tablets as they would like. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Ranch-a-Pal-ooza: When Min puts her chores off to have fun with Tara, it causes a chain of events that leads to An-gus squaring off with a wild spinosaurus. (S1 Ep37)
